items.sentence: I saw Tom and Mary walking in the park this morning.
I saw Tom last Monday walking in the park with Mary.
I scalded myself with boiling water from the kettle.
Tom asked Mary not to stop doing what she was doing.
Tom asked Mary to ask John why he wanted to do that.
Tom asked Mary what kind of games she liked to play.
Tom asked me some questions about what had happened.
Tom bought his camera for less than I paid for mine.
It\'s about three kilometers from here to the coast.
It\'s fun to learn slang words in foreign languages.
